cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m), old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
(modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])
this (Cantonese), see also 呢[nī], see also 哩哩羅羅|哩哩罗罗[lī lī lūo lūo]
